metadata.title: CVE-2015-5221 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in the mif_process_cmpt function inlibjasper/mif/mif_cod.c in the JasPer JPEG-2000 library before 1.900.2allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a craftedJPEG 2000 image file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5221` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjasper-runtime - 1.900.1-14ubuntu3.5
libjasper1 - 1.900.1-14ubuntu3.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jasper package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.900.1-14ubuntu3.5').
